name: Fully Homomoprhic Encryption
description:
The presentation will cover:
- Introduction to FHE
- Why FHE needs ZK
- Technical overview of the design of a ZK circuit that proves correct encryption/decryption under a FHE scheme
- Applications and use cases

speakers.name: Yuriko
speakers.bio: We're doing a research on the intersection of FHE and ZK, how we can combine those two to build cool applications/components to help the ecosystem.
